titleStmt.title: August. 5. Two letters, the one from the Lord Digby, to the Queens Majestie: the other from Mr. Thomas Elliot, to the Lord Digby, with observations upon the same letters. Also a noat [sic] of such armes as were sent for by His Maiestie out of Amsterdam, under his owne hand. Die Lune 1. August. 1642. Ordered that these two letters with the observations upon the same, be forthwith published in print. Hen. Elsinge Cler. Parl. D. Com.
Two letters, the one from the Lord Digby, to the Queens Majestie: the other from Mr. Thomas Elliot, to the Lord Digby, with observations upon the same letters.
titleStmt.author: Bristol, George Digby, Earl of, 1612-1677.
Elliot, Thomas.
England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.O. and G.D. for John Bartlet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
